name: Goblin Potion
description:
## Goblin Potion

A recipe crafted during the Great Goblin War. Consuming this potion turns your Bumpkin into a Goblin

### Supply

Coming soon

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
